summary: It is 1989, the final year of the Soviet era in Vilnius. Eighteen-year old buddies establish the Seneca's Fellowship. Its mottos is, "Live each day as if it was your last." 25 years later, ... See full summary »
cast: Janina Antaneliene|Ina Marija Bartaité|Pranciskus Brazdziunas|Arvydas Dapsys|Vesta Gabstaite|Dainius Gavenonis|Amelija Jundulaite|Larisa Kalpokaite|Valentin Kirejev|Neringa Krungleviciute|Elzbieta Latenaite|Emilija Latenaite-Beliauskiene|Mait Malmsten|Inesa Marcinkeviciute|Marijus Mazunas|Emilija Natkeviciute|Lukas Naudzius|Martynas Norvila|Augustinas Pietaris|Marius Repsys|Daiva Rudokaite|Artiom Rybakov|Arunas Sakalauskas|Helen Sanderson|Arunas Storpirstis|Renata Veberyte Loman|Jone Vildziunaite|Richardas Vitkaitas
title: Seneca's Day
